item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

0k add this void as well

public void animation2(int id, int Y, int X) //ANIMATIONS AT GROUND HEIGHT { outStream.createFrame(85); outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); outStream.createFrame(4); outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7) outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id outStream.writeByte(0);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it's written in pixels 100 pixels high outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic }

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

you dont have the animation void ill find it for you

public void animation(int id, int Y, int X) //ANIMATIONS AT GROUND HEIGHT { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { if(person.distanceToPoint(X, Y) <= 60) { person.animation2(id, Y, X); } } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Error

item.description:

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

but i get this error…

client.java:11557: cannot find symbol symbol : method animation(int,int,int) location: class client animation(435, absY, absX); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
